text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Payment date" means the date of the Commission's check.

"Proper invoice" means an invoice that:
contains:
the contractor's federal employer identification number or Social Security number; and
the contract or purchase order number or other description of the contract; and
contains or is accompanied by substantiating information and documentation as required by regulation or contract.
"Receipt date" means the date that a proper invoice is received by the Commission.
